message:
I don't want to go along with this guy.
But at the same time...
While I stare at my feet, unsure of what to do, Mink seizes me by the collar.

name: ミンク
message: "You're wasting time. Don't you care what happens to your grandmother?"

name: ミンク
message: "Then there's only one choice. Isn't there?"

Mink shoves me away and tosses my pills on the ground. I quickly snatch them up.

Then I realize what Mink said. We're leaving? But where's my bag?
